Chapter 8 Cybergeo 8.1 Introduction We analyze macroregions throughon a selection of 110 entities : 65 entities related to continent and “natural” Earth divisions : continents : Asia, Africa, Europa, … subcontinents : North Africa, Western Europe,.. peninsula/ archipel/ … : Scandinavia, Caraïbes, … bioclimatic area : Sahara, Amazonia, Sahel mountains/plain/… : Alps, Balkans, Ands, … Oceans/Seas/Gulf : Atlantic, Arctic, Mediterranea, … 45 regional organizations mentionned by Wikimedia : NATO, EU, CEI, NAFTA, … Warning : This analysis does not offer perfect guarantee of quality because : The list of entities has not been validated by the IMAGEUN’s partners The dictionary established in the different languages has not been controled by native speakers We use a corpus of text where target wikipedia entities has been recognized.
